title: [Large-Scale] Knowledge Management and Strategic Flexibility Design for Organizational Learning Capacity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational organizational behavior theories and learning theories
context.additional_context: Practical skills-oriented course for job seekers to cultivate organizational learning mechanisms and strategic response capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can explain balanced strategies between knowledge exploration and exploitation by applying them to 3 case analyses.
Learners can measure and evaluate the impact of an organization's strategic flexibility elements on learning outcomes using simulation tools.
Learners can design a learning model that integrates knowledge management competency (KMA) and strategic flexibility through team-based projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
